title: COSORI 11-in-1 Air Fryer Oven , 13Qt Small Footprint Airfryer combo with Rotisserie, Toast, Bake, Roast, Reheat Functions and more, Recipe Book & 6 Accessories Included, Perfect for Small Contertop
description: This air fryer oven features 11 functions packed into a stainless-steel housing with a 13-quart capacity. This versatile oven is designed to make cooking a breeze with 30+ chef-made recipes included to inspire your culinary creations. From baking to roasting, this is one oven to rule them all. The stainless-steel housing not only provides a sleek, modern look, but it also makes the oven durable and easy to clean. The large 13-quart capacity is perfect for cooking for a crowd or meal-prepping for the week.
Cooking Space Dimensions (D x W x H): 9.7 x 10.2 x 7.7 in
Product Dimensions (D x W x H): 13.5 x 13 x 14.5 in

In order to make sure the air fryer is working correctly and remove potential odors from the manufacturing process, please follow the instructions in the manual for the Test Run before cooking with your air fryer.
